    Welcome to the course page for the Summer 2018 offering INFO-UB 23: Introduction to Programming and Data Science, taught at NYU Stern. Please check the links above for the syllabus and course schedule.

    You might also want to visit our:

    • GitHub repository with course notebooks
    • Jupyterhub server for submitting homeworks and executing code
    • Slack channel for questions and help
    • NYU classes page for grades, lecture videos, and announcements
    • DataCamp for additional practice (sign up details in Slack)
    • YouTube for Berkley Center course videos

    Optionally, you can consult the following resources:

    • Python For Everybody
    • Learn Python 3 the Hard Way
    • Automate the Boring Stuff with Python
    • Learning MySQL
    • Python for Data Analysis
